advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: Pluto TV has all the action! Watch blockbuster tv series & the latest films with your favourite streaming service. Stream now. Pay never.
description:
Welcome to a whole new world of TV with PlutoTV - the leading free streaming TV and movie service. Watch your favorite content anytime, anywhere, on any device – all year round with Pluto TV’s ultimate free movies and TV show streaming.  

Get ready to binge any time you want with:
* 100s+ of live TV channels
* 1000s of free movies and TV shows
* 24/7 entertainment with our free movie and live TV app

Pluto TV is the top solution for free TV and movie streaming for everyone. Watch classic TV shows, news, sports, and popular movies. Whatever you choose, Pluto TV is available on any device, anywhere, so you can watch from the comfort of your own home or when you are on the move.

Download Pluto TV for endless streaming entertainment options with new movies and shows or series added constantly. Discover a better way to watch your favorite content with the best movie app and TV streaming. 

Stream now, and never pay with the best free streaming service.

Explore a variety of movie and TV genres, including:
* Action/Adventure
* Real Life Adventure
* True Crime 
* Reality TV
* Entertainment
* Comedy

Check back often so you don’t miss the new movies and TV series we add to our library every day.

PLUTO TV OPTIONS

BEST LIVE TV STREAMING FOR SPORTS, NEWS, & SHOWS
- Watch live sports including basketball, football, baseball, and classic games
- Dive into live channels, movies, shows or series, and romantic comedy specials
- Stream breaking news, opinion, and stats

THE LEADING FREE STREAMING SERVICE FOR WATCHING MOVIES ANYWHERE
- Watch movies for free from a wide range of action to comedy and sci-fi!     
- Stream movies free with everything from action films to sci-fi and romance flicks with the best movie app

NEWS, DOCUMENTARIES AND MUCH MORE!
- Stream breaking news with our free live TV app
- Watch TV for free as you dive into documentaries, from animals to science and history
- Watch binge-worthy entertainment from talk shows to game shows
                      
WATCH TV FOR FREE YOUR WAY
- Watch your favourite TV shows or series with 100s channels with our free live TV app
- Stream TV with free shows and series such as CSI, MacGyver, Count Duckula, and much more
- Watch TV seasons of popular hits like Hell’s Kitchen, A-Team, and Teen Mom

Watch free full movies and live TV shows everywhere, 100% free and legal. Download the Pluto TV app today!
